title: Unable to play
body: Can someone help me please? Every time i join a game i load in on 65 or so ms and then as soon as I click in the game my ping shoots up really high or i dc, and then when I alt tab I hear all the sounds of the abilities in one big sound, like the games loaded when I'm not on it but then when I alt tab back in to play, the second I click on the map again my ping shoots up and i dc again?

replies.body:
Hi Calvykins,

The first suggestion I'd make for you is to try the steps in our [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article.

See if that does anything to help

Cheers
Mindstar

So I have been on the troubleshooting page and I have talked to my ISP (Vodafone) and they told me apparently it is just packet-loss between my connection and your servers, how can I fix it? Will changing ISP help at all?

Before you look at changing ISPs, the first step will be to try and rule out your home network as the source of the packet loss.

* Do you connect to PC your router via Wifi (this is often a common cause of packet loss)?
* Is anything else using your internet connection at the same time?  Eg. youtube / torrents etc?  Try performing an isolation test where ONLY your computer is on the network.
* Try running a traceroute to our game servers - (103.240.227.254).  _It won't connect to the final destination, but will show you the quality of the path from you to the servers._

If you can confirm that the ISP is the source of the issues, then I'd say that it would be worth switching.
